text: Since the 1950s, London's primary passenger airport has been at Heathrow, with a second one at Gatwick. London's third airport may refer to: * London City Airport * London Stansted Airport * Luton Airport * The abandoned plans for Cublington Airport, and various proposals for a Thames Estuary Airport, all of which would have replaced Heathrow if built. Category:Airports in the London region
title: London's third airport
